name: Super Runner - Pixel Surfer
description:
Run away as fast as you can!
Dodge the crumbling blocks!

You've stolen the mystic cube from the pixel pyramid. Strange things are happening! Blocks are crumbling and coming at you!

Now you have to run away for your life! Escape from the crumbling block world! Watch out!

HOW TO PLAY:
1. Tilt your phone or tablet left, right, forward or backward.
2. Dodge the blocks and bricks; Pick up the power-ups.
3. Dash as fast as you can; Run away as far as you can. SCORE to win!
4. Use power ups to make it more fun!

FEATURES:
1. Best pixel style running game!
2. Exciting BGM & sound effects. Get heart beating and palm sweating!
3. Survive Earthquake, Upside Down and other events!
4. Free to play
5. Endless gameplay
6. Simple control
7. Various power ups such as Slow Down, Immunity, Magnet, etc.

Tilt your phone left or right to direct you through the blocks! Tilt your phone forward or backward to accelerate or slow down!

Tilt to turn, accelerate or slow down to avoid obstacles, collect power ups, unlock new characters, and see how far you can run!

Test your reflexes, as you race amongst the bulging and engulfing blocks. Help yourself escape from the gloomy blocks jungle, earthquake, and upside down space twist!
